pages.text: Exact rules to determine mob level can be configured through datapack. You can specify the minimum level(min), additive level bonus(base), level bonus as a factor of player level (scale), randomness (variation), and chance to make mobs to gain level or having traits.$(br2)One can specify a difficulty config entry for each dimension / biome / entity type, and all of them take effect collectively.

You can also configure the weight, level cost, max rank, min level, and entity blacklist / whitelist for each trait. When generating traits for a mob, each trait will have a chance to enter the trait pool. Then we pick one random trait from the pool, assign a rank, and repeat this process until we have no traits left in the pool, or total level cost of traits reach the mob level.
